content: such a sweet little blanket this stitch makes a lovely reversible baby blanket you may know it as double moss stitch or double seed stitch it is very easy to knit - and gives a lovely result the fabric can be a little stiff - so i knitted my blanket on 4 5mm needles to allow a looser softer feel perfect for a newborn preemie or doll a lovely choice for a gender-neutral baby blanket **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
